Module rrpss
Package invoice

Class Invoice

java.lang.Object
invoice.Invoice
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Invoice extends Object implements Serializable
An invoice is generated and serves as a receipt for customers. It contains the order, as well as calculation of final prices.
Author:
Trevor
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Invoice

      public Invoice​(int invoiceId, int orderId, int tableId, double totalPrice, Calendar timestamp, double discount, Order ord)
      This creates an invoice
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - This invoice's ID
      orderId - This invoices's order ID
      tableId - This invoice's table ID
      totalPrice - The subtotal before adding tax and before deducting discount
      timestamp - The timestamp of creation of this invoice
      discount - This invoice's discount in absolute dollars
      ord - The contents of the order for which we will generate the invoice
